page.title: 05Art and Craft_The Forge
page.content: Hunmanby Forge is a metal forge and craft shop run by Mr.John Hill. {Apparatus.}There are 4 welding apparatus.They include a mig pocket welder,a gas_bottle welder,an electric welder and the traditional fire welding. Mr.Hill no longer makes any horse shoes,he has worked here about 20 years but only two people work here now.The workshop has been built in sections,one end is 60 years old and the other is just 20 years old.He makes good quality wrought iron for churches. {Work.}He uses mild steel which is obtained from Hull.He starts work in the morning at 8 a.m.finishing at 5:30 p.m. {Goods.}Mr. Hill made a 9 ft high wrought iron cross for York Minster. He also makes decorative iron work.
